import React,{useState} from 'react' import Inputfeild from '../components/Inputfeild' import flogo from '../assets/images/FIGHT_CLUB-removebg-preview.png' import axios from 'axios' function Signup() { const [firstname,setfirstname]=useState(''); const [secondname,setsecondname]=useState(''); function signuprequest(){ const csrfToken = document.querySelector('meta[name="csrf-token"]').getAttribute('content'); axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/auth/login' , { "firstname": firstname, "secondname":secondname}, {headers: {'X-CSRFToken': csrfToken }}) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); }) } return (

Join the fight club community now for Free

setfirstname(e.target.value)} />
setsecondname(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Signup
